column5: Just wondering, are there any fishing opportunities by Albion Falls and if any, what types of fish are there?
EDIT: Dunno if were talking about the same place.
I think he means in Hamilton by Upper Kings Forest Park.  sorry can't tell you, never been and doesn't show on Fish-on-line
I GREW UP THERE - the only thing you get is some trout running in the lower creek in fall and suckers  -  have to go to the golf course or lower -
Yeah, I grew up a bit further south, but BARE is right. You're better off fishing below Queenston.
